scriptLines:
query: '
 
 SELECT DC.Upload_Time as Upload_Time,
        DC.project_id as project_id,
        DC.[Group] as [Group],
        DC.[Activity_Description] as [Activity_Description],
        DC.[Actual_Start_Date] as [Actual_Start_Date],
        DC.[Actual_Finish_Date] as [Actual_Finish_Date],
          DATEDIFF(DAY,DC.[Actual_Finish_Date], DC.[Actual_Start_Date]) AS Total_days,
        DATEDIFF(DAY,GETDATE(), DC.[Actual_Start_Date]) AS Days_elapsed,
       CASE 
            WHEN DC.[Group] = 'Structural Works' AND DC.[Activity_Description] IN ('Pile Cap','Pile')  THEN 'MANUAL_ENTRY'
            WHEN DC.[Group] = 'External Elevation' AND DC.[Activity_Description] IN ('ACP Works')  THEN 'MANUAL_ENTRY'
            WHEN DC.[Group] = 'Other & Specialist' AND DC.[Activity_Description] IN ('Lift - CTU','Lift - Balance passenger lifts','Swimming Pool','Kids Play Area/ Outdoor Play Area',
               'Changing Rooms / GYM','Wooden Decking')  THEN 'MANUAL_ENTRY'
            WHEN DC.[Group] = 'Authority Approvals' AND DC.[Activity_Description] IN ('Transformer payment','LV Inspection & Approval','BCC - Inspection & Approval','Power on') THEN 'MANUAL_ENTRY'
            WHEN DC.[Group] = 'Structural Works' AND DC.[Activity_Description] IN ('Grade Slab','Podium Slabs','Typical Floor Slabs')  THEN 'PLN_STRUCTURE_FACT'
            WHEN DC.[Group] = 'Structural Works' AND DC.[Activity_Description] NOT IN ('Pile','Pile Cap','Grade Slab','Podium Slabs','Typical Floor Slabs')  THEN 'TBD'
            WHEN DC.[Group] = 'Masonary Works' AND DC.[Activity_Description] IN ('Blockworks')  THEN 'PLN_DRYAREA_FACT'
            WHEN DC.[Group] = 'Finishes - Dry Area' THEN 'PLN_DRYAREA_FACT'
            WHEN DC.[Group] = 'External Elevation' AND DC.[Activity_Description] IN ('Sliding Door')  THEN 'PLN_DRYAREA_FACT'
            WHEN DC.[Group] = 'Finishes - Wet Area' THEN 'PLN_WETAREA_FACT'
            WHEN DC.[Group] = 'Joinery Works' AND DC.[Activity_Description] IN ('Vanity Cabinet')  THEN 'PLN_WETAREA_FACT'
            WHEN DC.[Group] = 'Finishes - Corridor' THEN 'PLN_CORRIDOR_FACT'
            WHEN DC.[Group] = 'External Elevation' AND DC.[Activity_Description] IN ('EIFS','Balustrade Works')  THEN 'PLN_BALCONYAREA_FACT'
            WHEN DC.[Group] = 'Other & Specialist' AND DC.[Activity_Description] IN ('Kitchen Appliances')  THEN 'PLN_KITCHENAREA_FACT'
            WHEN DC.[Group] = 'Joinery Works' AND DC.[Activity_Description] IN ('Kitchen Cabinet')  THEN 'PLN_KITCHENAREA_FACT'
            WHEN DC.[Group] = 'Keepout' THEN 'PLN_KEEPOUT_FACT'
            WHEN DC.[Group] = 'Authority Approvals' AND DC.[Activity_Description] NOT IN ('Transformer payment','LV Inspection & Approval','BCC - Inspection & Approval','Power on') THEN 'TBD'
            WHEN DC.[Group] = 'External Elevation' AND DC.[Activity_Description] NOT IN ('Sliding Door','EIFS','Balustrade Works','ACP Works')  THEN 'TBD'
            WHEN DC.[Group] = 'Other & Specialist' AND DC.[Activity_Description] NOT IN (
                                                                                    'Kitchen Appliances',
                                                                                    'Lift - CTU',
                                                                                    'Lift - Balance passenger lifts',
                                                                                    'Swimming Pool',
                                                                                    'Kids Play Area/ Outdoor Play Area',
                                                                                    'Changing Rooms / GYM',
                                                                                    'Wooden Decking')  THEN 'TBD'
            WHEN DC.[Group] = 'Joinery Works' AND DC.[Activity_Description] NOT IN ('Vanity Cabinet','Kitchen Cabinet')  THEN 'TBD'
            ELSE 'MISSING'
        END AS Source_Templet,
        OLMP.Sort_Group as Sort_Group,
        OLMP.Sort_Activity as Sort_Activity,
        OLMP.Activity_New as Activity_New,
        P.FLAT_COUNT as FLAT_COUNT,
        DC.[Actual_Percentage] as [Actual_Percentage]
--INTO #MILESTONE_MAIN_TABLE
 FROM  (
 SELECT Upload_Time,
          project_id,
          [Group],
          [Activity_Description],
          CAST(CASE WHEN ISNULL(FC.[Actual_Start_Date],'') = '' THEN NULL
            WHEN FC.[Actual_Start_Date] LIKE '%/19' THEN REPLACE(FC.[Actual_Start_Date],'/19','/2019')
            WHEN FC.[Actual_Start_Date] LIKE '%/20' THEN REPLACE(FC.[Actual_Start_Date],'/20','/2020')
            WHEN FC.[Actual_Start_Date] LIKE '%/21' THEN REPLACE(FC.[Actual_Start_Date],'/21','/2021')
            WHEN FC.[Actual_Start_Date] LIKE '%/22' THEN REPLACE(FC.[Actual_Start_Date],'/22','/2022')
            WHEN FC.[Actual_Start_Date] LIKE '%/23' THEN REPLACE(FC.[Actual_Start_Date],'/23','/2023')
            WHEN FC.[Actual_Start_Date] LIKE '%/24' THEN REPLACE(FC.[Actual_Start_Date],'/24','/2024')
            ELSE FC.[Actual_Start_Date]
        END  AS DATE) [Actual_Start_Date], 
          CAST(CASE WHEN ISNULL(FC.[Actual_Start_Date],'') = '' THEN NULL
            WHEN FC.[Actual_Finish_Date] LIKE '%/19' THEN REPLACE(FC.[Actual_Finish_Date],'/19','/2019')
            WHEN FC.[Actual_Finish_Date] LIKE '%/20' THEN REPLACE(FC.[Actual_Finish_Date],'/20','/2020')
            WHEN FC.[Actual_Finish_Date] LIKE '%/21' THEN REPLACE(FC.[Actual_Finish_Date],'/21','/2021')
            WHEN FC.[Actual_Finish_Date] LIKE '%/22' THEN REPLACE(FC.[Actual_Finish_Date],'/22','/2022')
            WHEN FC.[Actual_Finish_Date] LIKE '%/23' THEN REPLACE(FC.[Actual_Finish_Date],'/23','/2023')
            WHEN FC.[Actual_Finish_Date] LIKE '%/24' THEN REPLACE(FC.[Actual_Finish_Date],'/24','/2024')
            ELSE FC.[Actual_Finish_Date]
        END  AS DATE) [Actual_Finish_Date],
          [Actual_Percentage]
 FROM  ( 
 SELECT
        CAST(OPM.upload_time AS DATE) AS Upload_Time,
        OPM.project_id,
        OPM.[Group],
        OPM.[Activity_Description],
        CASE 
            WHEN OPM.[Actual_Forecast_Start] IS NULL OR TRIM(OPM.[Actual_Forecast_Start]) IN ('','-',' ') THEN REPLACE(OPM.[Baseline_Start],'-','/')
            ELSE REPLACE(OPM.[Actual_Forecast_Start],'-','/')
        END AS [Actual_Start_Date],
        CASE 
            WHEN OPM.[Actual_Forecast_Start] IS NULL OR TRIM(OPM.[Actual_Forecast_Start]) IN ('','-',' ') THEN REPLACE(OPM.[Baseline_Start],'-','/')
            ELSE REPLACE(OPM.[Actual_Forecast_Start],'-','/')
        END [Actual_Finish_Date],
        DENSE_RANK() OVER( PARTITION BY OPM.project_id ORDER BY CAST(OPM.upload_time AS DATE) DESC) DENSERANK,
        OPM.[Actual_Percentage]
    FROM
        STG.O_PLN_MILESTONE_STG OPM 
        WHERE 
(OPM.[Group] IS NOT NULL AND TRIM(OPM.[Group]) NOT IN ('')
                AND OPM.[Activity_Description] IS NOT NULL AND TRIM(OPM.[Activity_Description]) NOT IN (''))
) FC
WHERE FC.DENSERANK = 1
 ) DC
 LEFT JOIN STG.O_PLN_MILESTONE_MAP_STG OLMP
                ON DC.[Group] = OLMP.[Group] 
                AND DC.[Activity_Description] = OLMP.Activity
 LEFT JOIN STG.PROJECTS_STG P
                ON DC.project_id = P.Project_Identifier
',

query: 'SELECT  a.Project_Identifier,a.Type_of_work,a.SUM_ALL, 'PLN_DRYAREA_FACT' AS Source_Table
from(
SELECT      DAR.Project_Identifier,
            DAR.Type_of_work,
            DENSE_RANK() OVER(PARTITION BY DAR.Project_Identifier ORDER BY DAR.tower) AS RANKER,
            SUM(DAR.value) AS SUM_ALL
FROM (
SELECT FPD.Project_Identifier, FPD.tower,
       FPD.[Level_ID],FPD.Flat,
       FPD.sclicer,CAST(REPLACE(FPD.value,'%','') AS DECIMAL) AS value,
       FPD.Type_of_work,FPD.ACTIVITY_ID
    FROM [DWH].[PLN_DRYAREA_FACT] FPD
    WHERE LOWER(FPD.Type_of_work) IN ('Plaster','Screed','Floor Tile','FC Framing', 'FC Boarding with Joint Taping',
                                        'Floor Tiling')
    AND (FPD.value LIKE '1%' OR FPD.value LIKE '2%' OR FPD.value LIKE '3%' OR FPD.value LIKE '4%' OR FPD.value LIKE '5%' 
     OR FPD.value LIKE '6%' OR FPD.value LIKE '7%' OR FPD.value LIKE '8%' OR FPD.value LIKE '9%'
                )) DAR  GROUP BY Project_Identifier,Type_of_work, DAR.tower) a',

query: 'SELECT          WAR.Project_Identifier,
                WAR.Type_of_work,
                SUM(WAR.value) AS SUM_ALL,
                    'PLN_WETAREA_FACT' AS Source_Table
FROM (
SELECT 
                WPD.Project_Identifier,
                WPD.tower,
                WPD.[Level_ID],
                WPD.Flat,
                WPD.sclicer,
                CAST(REPLACE(WPD.value,'%','') AS DECIMAL) AS value,
                WPD.Type_of_work,
                WPD.ACTIVITY_ID
            FROM [DWH].[PLN_WETAREA_FACT] WPD 
            WHERE
                LOWER(WPD.Type_of_work) IN (
                                            'Wet Area Screed',
                                            'Wet Area MEP H/L Boarding Clearance',
                                            'Wall tile bottom Tile',
                                            'Wet Area FC Framing',
                                            'FC Boarding & Joint Taping',
                                            'Floor Tile',
                                            'Wet Area Final Fixtures Installation',
                                            'Vanity Cabinet'
                                            )
                AND (WPD.value LIKE '1%'
                    OR WPD.value LIKE '2%'
                    OR WPD.value LIKE '3%'
                    OR WPD.value LIKE '4%'
                    OR WPD.value LIKE '5%'
                    OR WPD.value LIKE '6%'
                    OR WPD.value LIKE '7%'
                    OR WPD.value LIKE '8%'
                    OR WPD.value LIKE '9%'
                    ) 
) WAR
GROUP BY Project_Identifier,Type_of_work
',

query: 'SELECT 
                CAR.Project_Identifier,
                CAR.Type_of_work,
                SUM(CAR.value) AS SUM_ALL,
                    'PLN_CORRIDOR_FACT' AS Source_Table
FROM (
SELECT 
            FPC.Project_Identifier,
            FPC.tower,
            FPC.[Level_ID],
            --FPC.sclicer,
            CAST(REPLACE(FPC.value,'%','') AS DECIMAL) AS value,
            FPC.Type_of_work,
            FPC.ACTIVITY_ID
        FROM [DWH].[PLN_CORRIDOR_FACT] FPC 
        WHERE
            LOWER(FPC.Type_of_work) IN (
                                        'CORRIDOR Floor Tile',
                                        'CORRIDOR Wall Tile',
                                        'CORRIDOR FC Boarding'
                                        )
            AND (FPC.value LIKE '1%'
                OR FPC.value LIKE '2%'
                OR FPC.value LIKE '3%'
                OR FPC.value LIKE '4%'
                OR FPC.value LIKE '5%'
                OR FPC.value LIKE '6%'
                OR FPC.value LIKE '7%'
                OR FPC.value LIKE '8%'
                OR FPC.value LIKE '9%'
                ) 
) CAR
GROUP BY Project_Identifier,Type_of_work
',

query: 'SELECT 
                KAR.Project_Identifier,
                KAR.Type_of_work,
                SUM(KAR.value) AS SUM_ALL,
                    'PLN_KITCHENAREA_FACT' AS Source_Table
FROM (
SELECT 
                FPK.Project_Identifier,
                FPK.tower,
                FPK.[Level_ID],
                FPK.Flat,
               -- FPK.sclicer,
                CAST(REPLACE(CASE WHEN FPK.value= '#N/A' THEN NULL ELSE FPK.value END ,'%','') AS DECIMAL) AS value,
                FPK.Type_of_work,
                FPK.ACTIVITY_ID
            FROM [DWH].[PLN_KITCHENAREA_FACT] FPK 
            WHERE
                LOWER(FPK.Type_of_work) IN (
                                            'Kitchen Appliances'
                                            )
                AND (FPK.value LIKE '1%'
                    OR FPK.value LIKE '2%'
                    OR FPK.value LIKE '3%'
                    OR FPK.value LIKE '4%'
                    OR FPK.value LIKE '5%'
                    OR FPK.value LIKE '6%'
                    OR FPK.value LIKE '7%'
                    OR FPK.value LIKE '8%'
                    OR FPK.value LIKE '9%'
                    )
) KAR
GROUP BY Project_Identifier,Type_of_work
',

query: 'SELECT 
                BAR.Project_Identifier,
                BAR.Type_of_work,
                SUM(BAR.value) AS SUM_ALL,
                    'PLN_BALCONYAREA_FACT' AS Source_Table
FROM (
SELECT 
                FPB.Project_Identifier,
                FPB.tower,
                FPB.[Level_ID],
                FPB.Flat,
                --FPB.sclicer,
                CAST(REPLACE(FPB.value,'%','') AS DECIMAL) AS value,
                FPB.Type_of_work,
                FPB.ACTIVITY_ID
            FROM [DWH].[PLN_BALCONYAREA_FACT] FPB 
            WHERE
                LOWER(FPB.Type_of_work) IN (
                                            'EIFS Installation'
                                            )
                AND (FPB.value LIKE '1%'
                    OR FPB.value LIKE '2%'
                    OR FPB.value LIKE '3%'
                    OR FPB.value LIKE '4%'
                    OR FPB.value LIKE '5%'
                    OR FPB.value LIKE '6%'
                    OR FPB.value LIKE '7%'
                    OR FPB.value LIKE '8%'
                    OR FPB.value LIKE '9%'
                    )
) BAR
GROUP BY Project_Identifier,Type_of_work
',

query: 'SELECT 
                SGS.Project_Identifier,
                'Sliding Door' AS Type_of_work,
                SUM(Multiply_Factor*SUM_ALL) AS SUM_ALL,
                'PLN_DRYAREA_FACT' AS Source_Table
FROM (
SELECT 
                SDR.Project_Identifier,
                SDR.Type_of_work,
                    CASE 
                    WHEN Type_of_work = 'Sliding Door Box Installation'     THEN 0.1
                    WHEN Type_of_work = 'Sliding Door Frame Installation'     THEN 0.2
                    WHEN Type_of_work = 'Sliding Door Glass Installation'     THEN 0.45
                    WHEN Type_of_work = 'Sliding Door Internal Silicone'     THEN 0.1
                    WHEN Type_of_work = 'Sliding Door Alignment'             THEN 0.05
                    WHEN Type_of_work = 'Sliding Door External Silicone'     THEN 0.1
                END AS Multiply_Factor,
                SUM(SDR.value) AS SUM_ALL
FROM (
SELECT 
            FPD.Project_Identifier,
            FPD.tower,
            FPD.[Level_ID],
            FPD.Flat,
            --FPD.sclicer,
            CAST(REPLACE(FPD.value,'%','') AS DECIMAL) AS value,
            FPD.Type_of_work,
            FPD.ACTIVITY_ID
        FROM [DWH].[PLN_DRYAREA_FACT] FPD 
        WHERE
            LOWER(FPD.Type_of_work) IN (
                                        'Sliding Door Box Installation',
                                        'Sliding Door Frame Installation',
                                        'Sliding Door Glass Installation',
                                        'Sliding Door Internal Silicone',
                                        'Sliding Door Alignment',
                                        'Sliding Door External Silicone'
                                        )
            AND (FPD.value LIKE '1%'
                OR FPD.value LIKE '2%'
                OR FPD.value LIKE '3%'
                OR FPD.value LIKE '4%'
                OR FPD.value LIKE '5%'
                OR FPD.value LIKE '6%'
                OR FPD.value LIKE '7%'
                OR FPD.value LIKE '8%'
                OR FPD.value LIKE '9%'
                )
) SDR
GROUP BY Project_Identifier,Type_of_work
)SGS
GROUP BY Project_Identifier',

query: 'SELECT 
                SGS.Project_Identifier,
                'Kitchen Cabinet' AS Type_of_work,
                SUM(Multiply_Factor*SUM_ALL) AS SUM_ALL,
                'PLN_KITCHENAREA_FACT' AS Source_Table
FROM (
SELECT 
                SDR.Project_Identifier,
                SDR.Type_of_work,
                SUM(SDR.value) AS SUM_ALL,
                    CASE 
                    WHEN Type_of_work = 'Kitchen Cabinet'                 THEN 0.5
                    WHEN Type_of_work = 'Kitchen Counter Plywood'         THEN 0.1
                    WHEN Type_of_work = 'Kitchen Counter Top'             THEN 0.2
                    WHEN Type_of_work = 'Kitchen Counter Top Skirting'     THEN 0.1
                    WHEN Type_of_work = 'Kitchen Cabinet Grouting'         THEN 0.05
                    WHEN Type_of_work = 'Kitchen Cabinet Silicone'         THEN 0.05
                END AS Multiply_Factor
FROM (
SELECT 
            FPK.Project_Identifier,
            FPK.tower,
            FPK.[Level_ID],
            FPK.Flat,
           -- FPK.sclicer,
            CAST(REPLACE(FPK.value,'%','') AS DECIMAL) AS value,
            FPK.Type_of_work,
            FPK.ACTIVITY_ID
        FROM [DWH].[PLN_KITCHENAREA_FACT] FPK 
        WHERE
            LOWER(FPK.Type_of_work) IN (
                                        'Kitchen Cabinet',
                                        'Kitchen Counter Plywood',
                                        'Kitchen Counter Top',
                                        'Kitchen Counter Top Skirting',
                                        'Kitchen Cabinet Grouting',
                                        'Kitchen Cabinet Silicone'
                                        )
            AND (FPK.value LIKE '1%'
                OR FPK.value LIKE '2%'
                OR FPK.value LIKE '3%'
                OR FPK.value LIKE '4%'
                OR FPK.value LIKE '5%'
                OR FPK.value LIKE '6%'
                OR FPK.value LIKE '7%'
                OR FPK.value LIKE '8%'
                OR FPK.value LIKE '9%'
                )
) SDR
GROUP BY Project_Identifier,Type_of_work
)SGS
GROUP BY Project_Identifier
',

query: 'SELECT 
                KAA.Project_Identifier,
                KAA.Type_of_work,
                (KAA.SUM_ALL*100) AS SUM_ALL,
                'PLN_KEEPOUT_FACT' AS Source_Table
FROM (
SELECT 
                KAR.Project_Identifier,
                KAR.Type_of_work,
                SUM(KAR.value) AS SUM_ALL
FROM (
SELECT 
                FPK.Project_Identifier,
                FPK.tower,
                --FPK.[Level_ID],
                FPK.Flat,
                'Keep Out' AS sclicer,
                CAST(REPLACE(FPK.value,'%','') AS DECIMAL) AS value,
                FPK.Type_of_work,
                FPK.ACTIVITY_ID
            FROM [DWH].[PLN_KEEPOUT_FACT] FPK 
            WHERE
                LOWER(FPK.Type_of_work) IN (
                                            'Bathroom Stamp - Civil (L9)',
                                            'Kitchen Stamp - Civil (I9)',
                                            'Keep Out (QT)'
                                            )
                AND (FPK.value LIKE '1%'
                    OR FPK.value LIKE '2%'
                    OR FPK.value LIKE '3%'
                    OR FPK.value LIKE '4%'
                    OR FPK.value LIKE '5%'
                    OR FPK.value LIKE '6%'
                    OR FPK.value LIKE '7%'
                    OR FPK.value LIKE '8%'
                    OR FPK.value LIKE '9%'
                    )
) KAR
GROUP BY Project_Identifier,Type_of_work,tower,ACTIVITY_ID
)KAA
GROUP BY Project_Identifier,Type_of_work,SUM_ALL
',

query: 'SELECT 
                BGS.Project_Identifier,
                'Blockwork' AS Type_of_work,
                SUM(BGS.Multiply_Factor*BGS.SUM_ALL) AS SUM_ALL,
                'PLN_DRYAREA_FACT' AS Source_Table
FROM (
SELECT 
                BWR.Project_Identifier,
                BWR.Type_of_work,
                SUM(BWR.value) AS SUM_ALL,
                    CASE 
                    WHEN Type_of_work = 'Blockwork First Layer'     THEN 0.2
                    WHEN Type_of_work = 'Blockwork'                 THEN 0.4
                    WHEN Type_of_work = 'GI Lintel'                 THEN 0.1
                    WHEN Type_of_work = 'Above Lintel Block Work'     THEN 0.3
                END AS Multiply_Factor
FROM (
SELECT 
            FPD.Project_Identifier,
            FPD.tower,
            FPD.[Level_ID],
            FPD.Flat,
            --FPD.sclicer,
            CAST(REPLACE(FPD.value,'%','') AS DECIMAL) AS value,
            FPD.Type_of_work,
            FPD.ACTIVITY_ID
        FROM [DWH].[PLN_DRYAREA_FACT] FPD 
        WHERE
            LOWER(FPD.Type_of_work) IN ('Blockwork First Layer','Blockwork','GI Lintel','Above Lintel Block Work')
            AND (FPD.value LIKE '1%'OR FPD.value LIKE '2%'OR FPD.value LIKE '3%'OR FPD.value LIKE '4%'OR FPD.value LIKE '5%' OR FPD.value LIKE '6%'OR FPD.value LIKE '7%'OR FPD.value LIKE '8%'
                OR FPD.value LIKE '9%' )
) BWR
GROUP BY Project_Identifier,Type_of_work
)BGS
GROUP BY Project_Identifier

',

query: 'SELECT 
                BGS.Project_Identifier,
                'Balustrade Works' AS Type_of_work,
                SUM(BGS.Multiply_Factor*BGS.SUM_ALL) AS SUM_ALL,
                'PLN_DRYAREA_FACT' AS Source_Table
FROM (
SELECT 
                BWR.Project_Identifier,
                BWR.Type_of_work,
                SUM(BWR.value) AS SUM_ALL,
                    CASE 
                    WHEN Type_of_work = 'F channel Installation'             THEN 0.2
                    WHEN Type_of_work = 'Top Rail Bracket Installation'        THEN 0.2
                    WHEN Type_of_work = 'Balustrade Glass Installation'        THEN 0.2
                    WHEN Type_of_work = 'Balustrade Top Rail'                 THEN 0.2
                    WHEN Type_of_work = 'Balustrade-Internal Flashing'        THEN 0.2
                END AS Multiply_Factor
FROM (
SELECT 
            FPB.Project_Identifier,
            FPB.tower,
            FPB.[Level_ID],
            FPB.Flat,
            --FPB.sclicer,
            CAST(REPLACE(FPB.value,'%','') AS DECIMAL) AS value,
            FPB.Type_of_work,
            FPB.ACTIVITY_ID
        FROM [DWH].[PLN_DRYAREA_FACT] FPB 
        WHERE
            LOWER(FPB.Type_of_work) IN ('F channel Installation','Top Rail Bracket Installation','Balustrade Glass Installation','Balustrade Top Rail','Balustrade-Internal Flashing')
            AND (FPB.value LIKE '1%'OR FPB.value LIKE '2%'OR FPB.value LIKE '3%'OR FPB.value LIKE '4%'OR FPB.value LIKE '5%'OR FPB.value LIKE '6%'OR FPB.value LIKE '7%'OR FPB.value LIKE '8%'OR FPB.value LIKE '9%')
) BWR
GROUP BY Project_Identifier,Type_of_work
)BGS
GROUP BY Project_Identifier
',

query: ' SELECT SGF.Project_Identifier,SGF.Type_of_work,(SGF.SUM_ALL*P.FLAT_COUNT)*100 AS SUM_ALL,SGF.Source_Table
FROM (SELECT Project_Identifier , Area AS Type_of_work, Actuals AS SUM_ALL,'F_PLN_STRUCTURES' AS Source_Table
FROM (SELECT GSCU.*, 'Grade Slab' AS Area, GSCM.GS_COMPLETED,
CASE WHEN GS_Count=0 THEN NULL ELSE CAST((GSCM.GS_COMPLETED/GS_Count) AS DECIMAL(3,2)) END AS Actuals
FROM  (SELECT P.Project_Identifier, COUNT(*) AS GS_Count FROM [STG].[O_PLN_STRUCTURES_POUR_MAP_STG] OSPM
       LEFT JOIN [DWH].[PLN_PROJECTS_DIM] P  ON OSPM.project_id  = P.Project_Identifier
       WHERE LOWER(OSPM.type_of_pour) LIKE 'slab%' GROUP BY P.Project_Identifier ) GSCU 
   LEFT JOIN (SELECT FPS.Project_Identifier,COUNT(FPS.Level) AS GS_COMPLETED
   FROM [DWH].[PLN_STRUCTURE_FACT] FPS WHERE LOWER(FPS.Level) LIKE '%grade slab%' AND value IS NOT NULL
   GROUP BY FPS.Project_Identifier) AS GSCM ON GSCU.Project_Identifier = GSCM.Project_Identifier) GRADE_SLAB_FINAL UNION ALL
SELECT Project_Identifier ,Area AS Type_of_work, Actuals AS SUM_ALL,'F_PLN_STRUCTURES' AS Source_Table
FROM (SELECT CV.Project_Identifier,CV.Area,CV.Value,A.Total_Completed, case when CV.Value =0 then null
else FORMAT(CAST(A.Total_Completed AS DECIMAL(7,2) )/ CAST(CV.Value AS DECIMAL(7,2)),'N2') end as Actuals
FROM (SELECT P.Project_Identifier, Virtual_table.* FROM [DWH].[PLN_PROJECTS_DIM] P
     CROSS APPLY (SELECT 'Podium',(P.Total_Podiums*P.Podium_Slab) UNION ALL SELECT 'Typical Floor',
    (P.Total_Typical_Floor*P.Typical_Floor_Slab)) AS Virtual_table(Area,[Value])
    WHERE [Value] IS NOT NULL) CV  LEFT JOIN
     (SELECT FPS.Project_Identifier,OPTPM.Area ,COUNT(FPS.Pour) Total_Completed 
     FROM [DWH].[PLN_STRUCTURE_FACT]  FPS LEFT JOIN [STG].[O_PLN_TOWER_PODIUM_MAP_STG] OPTPM
     ON FPS.Project_Identifier = OPTPM.Project AND FPS.Level = OPTPM.Level
     WHERE FPS.Pour LIKE 'slab%' AND LOWER(TRIM(FPS.Level))!= 'grade slab'
     GROUP BY FPS.Project_Identifier,OPTPM.Area) A 
    ON CV.Project_Identifier = A.Project_Identifier AND CV.Area = A.Area)OTHER_SLABS_FINAL) SGF 
LEFT JOIN [DWH].[PLN_PROJECTS_DIM] P 
    ON SGF.Project_Identifier = P.Project_Identifier',

query: 'SELECT DC.Upload_Time,  P.Project_Identifier, DC.[Group], DC.[Activity_Description],
case when Actual_Start_Date = '1900-01-01' then NULL else DC.[Actual_Start_Date] end as Actual_Start_Date,
case when Actual_Finish_Date ='1900-01-01' then NULL else DC.[Actual_Finish_Date] end as Actual_Finish_Date,
DATEDIFF(DAY, DC.[Actual_Start_Date],DC.[Actual_Finish_Date]) AS Total_days,
   DATEDIFF(DAY, DC.[Actual_Start_Date],GETDATE()) AS Days_elapsed,
   CASE
--             For Manual Entry
   WHEN DC.[Group] = 'Structural Works' AND DC.[Activity_Description] IN ('Pile Cap','Pile')  THEN 'MANUAL_ENTRY'
   WHEN DC.[Group] = 'External Elevation' AND DC.[Activity_Description] IN ('ACP Works')  THEN 'MANUAL_ENTRY'
   WHEN DC.[Group] = 'Other & Specialist' AND DC.[Activity_Description] IN ('Lift - CTU','Lift - Balance passenger lifts',
   'Swimming Pool','Kids Play Area/ Outdoor Play Area','Changing Rooms / GYM','Wooden Decking')  THEN 'MANUAL_ENTRY'
   WHEN DC.[Group] = 'Authority Approvals' AND DC.[Activity_Description] IN ('Transformer payment', 'LV Inspection & Approval',
   'BCC - Inspection & Approval','Power on') THEN 'MANUAL_ENTRY'
--         For Structures
   WHEN DC.[Group] = 'Structural Works' AND DC.[Activity_Description] IN ('Grade Slab','Podium Slabs','Typical Floor Slabs')
   THEN 'PLN_STRUCTURE_FACT' WHEN DC.[Group] = 'Structural Works' AND DC.[Activity_Description] NOT IN
   ('Pile','Pile Cap','Grade Slab','Podium Slabs','Typical Floor Slabs')  THEN 'TBD'
--         For Dry Area
   WHEN DC.[Group] = 'Masonary Works' AND DC.[Activity_Description] IN ('Blockworks')  THEN 'PLN_DRYAREA_FACT' WHEN 
   DC.[Group] = 'Finishes - Dry Area' THEN 'PLN_DRYAREA_FACT'
   WHEN DC.[Group] = 'External Elevation' AND DC.[Activity_Description] IN ('Sliding Door')  THEN 'PLN_DRYAREA_FACT'
--         For Wet Area    
   WHEN DC.[Group] = 'Finishes - Wet Area' THEN 'PLN_WETAREA_FACT'
   WHEN DC.[Group] = 'Joinery Works' AND DC.[Activity_Description] IN ('Vanity Cabinet')  THEN 'PLN_WETAREA_FACT'
--         For Corridor Area
   WHEN DC.[Group] = 'Finishes - Corridor' THEN 'PLN_CORRIDOR_FACT'
--         For Balcony Area
   WHEN DC.[Group] = 'External Elevation' AND DC.[Activity_Description] IN ('EIFS','Balustrade Works')  THEN 'PLN_BALCONYAREA_FACT'
--         For Kitchen Area
   WHEN DC.[Group] = 'Other & Specialist' AND DC.[Activity_Description] IN ('Kitchen Appliances')  THEN 'PLN_KITCHENAREA_FACT'
   WHEN DC.[Group] = 'Joinery Works' AND DC.[Activity_Description] IN ('Kitchen Cabinet')  THEN 'PLN_KITCHENAREA_FACT'
--         For KeepOut Area
   WHEN DC.[Group] = 'Keepout' THEN 'PLN_KEEPOUT_FACT'
--         Yet to be Decided
   WHEN DC.[Group] = 'Authority Approvals' AND DC.[Activity_Description] NOT IN ('Transformer payment',
   'LV Inspection & Approval','BCC - Inspection & Approval','Power on') THEN 'TBD'
   WHEN DC.[Group] = 'External Elevation' AND DC.[Activity_Description] NOT IN ('Sliding Door','EIFS','Balustrade Works','ACP Works')  THEN 'TBD'
   WHEN DC.[Group] = 'Other & Specialist' AND DC.[Activity_Description] NOT IN ('Kitchen Appliances',
   'Lift - CTU','Lift - Balance passenger lifts','Swimming Pool','Kids Play Area/ Outdoor Play Area',
    'Changing Rooms / GYM','Wooden Decking')  THEN 'TBD'
   WHEN DC.[Group] = 'Joinery Works' AND DC.[Activity_Description] NOT IN ('Vanity Cabinet','Kitchen Cabinet')  THEN 'TBD'
   ELSE 'MISSING' END AS Source_Templet, OLMP.Sort_Group, OLMP.Sort_Activity, OLMP.Activity_New, P.FLAT_COUNT,
        DC.[Actual_Percentage]
FROM (SELECT CAST(OPM.upload_time AS DATE) AS Upload_Time, OPM.project_id, OPM.[Group], OPM.Activity_Description,
CASE WHEN OPM.Actual_Forecast_Start IS NULL OR TRIM(OPM.Actual_Forecast_Start) IN ('','-',' ') THEN CAST(REPLACE(OPM.Baseline_Start,'-','/') AS DATE)
        ELSE CAST(REPLACE(OPM.Actual_Forecast_Start,'-','/') AS DATE)  END AS Actual_Start_Date,
    CASE WHEN OPM.Actual_Forecast_Finish IS NULL OR TRIM(OPM.Actual_Forecast_Finish ) IN ('','-',' ') THEN CAST(REPLACE(OPM.Baseline_Finish,'-','/') AS DATE)
        ELSE CAST(REPLACE(OPM.Actual_Forecast_Finish ,'-','/') AS DATE)  END Actual_Finish_Date,
    DENSE_RANK() OVER( PARTITION BY OPM.project_id ORDER BY CAST(OPM.upload_time AS DATE) DESC) DENSERANK,
    OPM.Actual_Percentage FROM [STG].[O_PLN_MILESTONE_STG] OPM WHERE  (OPM.[Group] IS NOT NULL AND TRIM(OPM.[Group]) NOT IN ('') 
     AND OPM.Activity_Description IS NOT NULL AND TRIM(OPM.Activity_Description) NOT IN (''))) DC
LEFT JOIN [STG].[O_PLN_MILESTONE_MAP_STG] OLMP ON DC.[Group] = OLMP.[Group] AND DC.[Activity_Description] = OLMP.Activity
LEFT JOIN [DWH].[PLN_PROJECTS_DIM] P ON DC.project_id = P.Project_Identifier WHERE DC.DENSERANK = 1',

query: 'SELECT DC.Upload_Time,  P.Project_Identifier, DC.[Group], DC.[Activity_Description],  DC.[Baseline_Start_Date],
   DC.[Baseline_Finish_Date], DATEDIFF(DAY, DC.[Baseline_Start_Date],DC.[Baseline_Finish_Date]) AS Total_days,
   DATEDIFF(DAY, DC.[Baseline_Start_Date],GETDATE()) AS Days_elapsed,
   CASE WHEN DATEDIFF(DAY,DC.[Baseline_Finish_Date], DC.[Baseline_Start_Date]) = 0 THEN 0
   WHEN (DATEDIFF(DAY,GETDATE(), DC.[Baseline_Start_Date])/ DATEDIFF(DAY,DC.[Baseline_Finish_Date], DC.[Baseline_Start_Date])) < 1
   AND (DATEDIFF(DAY,GETDATE(), DC.[Baseline_Start_Date])/ DATEDIFF(DAY,DC.[Baseline_Finish_Date], DC.[Baseline_Start_Date])) > 0 
   THEN (DATEDIFF(DAY,GETDATE(), DC.[Baseline_Start_Date])/ DATEDIFF(DAY,DC.[Baseline_Finish_Date], DC.[Baseline_Start_Date]))
   WHEN (DATEDIFF(DAY,GETDATE(), DC.[Baseline_Start_Date])/ DATEDIFF(DAY,DC.[Baseline_Finish_Date], DC.[Baseline_Start_Date])) < 0 THEN 0
   ELSE 1 END AS Completion_plan,
   CASE
--             For Manual Entry
   WHEN DC.[Group] = 'Structural Works' AND DC.[Activity_Description] IN ('Pile Cap','Pile')  THEN 'MANUAL_ENTRY'
   WHEN DC.[Group] = 'External Elevation' AND DC.[Activity_Description] IN ('ACP Works')  THEN 'MANUAL_ENTRY'
   WHEN DC.[Group] = 'Other & Specialist' AND DC.[Activity_Description] IN ('Lift - CTU','Lift - Balance passenger lifts',
   'Swimming Pool','Kids Play Area/ Outdoor Play Area','Changing Rooms / GYM','Wooden Decking')  THEN 'MANUAL_ENTRY'
   WHEN DC.[Group] = 'Authority Approvals' AND DC.[Activity_Description] IN ('Transformer payment', 'LV Inspection & Approval',
   'BCC - Inspection & Approval','Power on') THEN 'MANUAL_ENTRY'
--         For Structures
   WHEN DC.[Group] = 'Structural Works' AND DC.[Activity_Description] IN ('Grade Slab','Podium Slabs','Typical Floor Slabs')
   THEN 'PLN_STRUCTURE_FACT' WHEN DC.[Group] = 'Structural Works' AND DC.[Activity_Description] NOT IN
   ('Pile','Pile Cap','Grade Slab','Podium Slabs','Typical Floor Slabs')  THEN 'TBD'
--         For Dry Area
   WHEN DC.[Group] = 'Masonary Works' AND DC.[Activity_Description] IN ('Blockworks')  THEN 'PLN_DRYAREA_FACT' WHEN 
   DC.[Group] = 'Finishes - Dry Area' THEN 'PLN_DRYAREA_FACT'
   WHEN DC.[Group] = 'External Elevation' AND DC.[Activity_Description] IN ('Sliding Door')  THEN 'PLN_DRYAREA_FACT'
--         For Wet Area    
   WHEN DC.[Group] = 'Finishes - Wet Area' THEN 'PLN_WETAREA_FACT'
   WHEN DC.[Group] = 'Joinery Works' AND DC.[Activity_Description] IN ('Vanity Cabinet')  THEN 'PLN_WETAREA_FACT'
--         For Corridor Area
   WHEN DC.[Group] = 'Finishes - Corridor' THEN 'PLN_CORRIDOR_FACT'
--         For Balcony Area
   WHEN DC.[Group] = 'External Elevation' AND DC.[Activity_Description] IN ('EIFS','Balustrade Works')  THEN 'PLN_BALCONYAREA_FACT'
--         For Kitchen Area
   WHEN DC.[Group] = 'Other & Specialist' AND DC.[Activity_Description] IN ('Kitchen Appliances')  THEN 'PLN_KITCHENAREA_FACT'
   WHEN DC.[Group] = 'Joinery Works' AND DC.[Activity_Description] IN ('Kitchen Cabinet')  THEN 'PLN_KITCHENAREA_FACT'
--         For KeepOut Area
   WHEN DC.[Group] = 'Keepout' THEN 'PLN_KEEPOUT_FACT'
--         Yet to be Decided
   WHEN DC.[Group] = 'Authority Approvals' AND DC.[Activity_Description] NOT IN ('Transformer payment',
   'LV Inspection & Approval','BCC - Inspection & Approval','Power on') THEN 'TBD'
   WHEN DC.[Group] = 'External Elevation' AND DC.[Activity_Description] NOT IN ('Sliding Door','EIFS','Balustrade Works','ACP Works')  THEN 'TBD'
   WHEN DC.[Group] = 'Other & Specialist' AND DC.[Activity_Description] NOT IN ('Kitchen Appliances',
   'Lift - CTU','Lift - Balance passenger lifts','Swimming Pool','Kids Play Area/ Outdoor Play Area',
    'Changing Rooms / GYM','Wooden Decking')  THEN 'TBD'
   WHEN DC.[Group] = 'Joinery Works' AND DC.[Activity_Description] NOT IN ('Vanity Cabinet','Kitchen Cabinet')  THEN 'TBD'
   ELSE 'MISSING' END AS Source_Templet, OLMP.Sort_Group, OLMP.Sort_Activity, OLMP.Activity_New, P.FLAT_COUNT,
        DC.[Actual_Percentage]
--INTO #MILESTONE_MAIN_TABLE_Plan
FROM (SELECT CAST(OPM.upload_time AS DATE) AS Upload_Time,OPM.project_id, OPM.[Group], OPM.[Activity_Description],
       -- REPLACE(OPM.[Baseline_Start],'-','/') AS  [Baseline_Start_Date],
 CAST(REPLACE(OPM.[Baseline_Start],'-','/') AS DATE) AS  [Baseline_Start_Date],[Baseline_Start],[Baseline_Finish],
 CAST(REPLACE(OPM.[Baseline_Finish],'-','/') AS DATE) AS [Baseline_Finish_Date],
 DENSE_RANK() OVER( PARTITION BY OPM.project_id ORDER BY CAST(OPM.upload_time AS DATE) DESC) DENSERANK, OPM.[Actual_Percentage]
 FROM [STG].[O_PLN_MILESTONE_STG] OPM WHERE (OPM.[Group] IS NOT NULL AND TRIM(OPM.[Group]) NOT IN ('')
 AND OPM.[Activity_Description] IS NOT NULL AND TRIM(OPM.[Activity_Description]) NOT IN ('')
 AND OPM.[Baseline_Start] IS NOT NULL AND TRIM(OPM.[Baseline_Start]) NOT IN ('')
 AND OPM.[Baseline_Finish] IS NOT NULL AND TRIM(OPM.[Baseline_Finish]) NOT IN (''))) DC
LEFT JOIN [STG].[O_PLN_MILESTONE_MAP_STG] OLMP ON DC.[Group] = OLMP.[Group] AND DC.[Activity_Description] = OLMP.Activity
LEFT JOIN [DWH].[PLN_PROJECTS_DIM] P ON DC.project_id = P.Project_Identifier WHERE DC.DENSERANK = 1',

query: 'SELECT 
        Upload_Time AS Upload_Date,
        project_id,
        --Description,
        [Actual_Percentage],
        'Actuals' AS Legend,
        OPMP.*
--INTO #Manual_Actuals
FROM (
SELECT 
    CAST(OPM.upload_time AS DATE) AS Upload_Time,
    project_id,
    tower,
    sbu_id,
     [Activity],
    --Description,
    CASE 
        WHEN [Actual_Percentage] IS NULL OR TRIM([Actual_Percentage]) IN ('') THEN 0
        ELSE ISNULL(CAST(REPLACE([Actual_Percentage],'%','') AS DECIMAL),0.00)/100 
    END AS [Actual_Percentage],
    DENSE_RANK () OVER (PARTITION BY project_id ORDER BY CAST(OPM.upload_time AS DATE) DESC)  DenseRanker
FROM  [DWH].[PLN_MILESTONE_ACTUALS_TEMP_FACT] OPM
) C1
LEFT JOIN STG.O_PLN_MILESTONE_MAP_STG OPMP ON C1.[Activity] = OPMP.[Activity]
    WHERE DenseRanker = 1',

query: 'SELECT 
    Sort_Group,
    Sort_Activity+0.1 AS Sort_Activity,
    [Group],
    Activity,
    Activity_New,
    'Actuals' AS Legend,
    CONCAT(Activity_New,' : (A)') AS NEW_ACT  
FROM STG.O_PLN_MILESTONE_MAP_STG opmm 
UNION ALL 
SELECT 
    Sort_Group,
    Sort_Activity,
    [Group],
    Activity,
    Activity_New,
    'Plan' AS Legend,
    CONCAT(Activity_New,' : (P)') AS NEW_ACT  
FROM STG.O_PLN_MILESTONE_MAP_STG opmm',

DRYAREAGAANTFINAL, WETAREAGAANTFINAL, CORRIDORGAANTFINAL, KITCHENGAANTFINAL, BALCONYGAANTFINAL, SLIDINGDOORGAANTFINAL, KITCHENCABINETGAANTFINAL, KEEPOUTGAANTFINAL, BLOCKWORKGAANTFINAL, BALUSTRADEWORKSGAANTFINAL, STRUCTUREGAANTFINAL union(byName: true)~> unionfacttables
trim(Type_of_work) == 'FC BOARDING WITH JOINT TAPING' && Source_Table == 'PLN_DRYAREA_FACT','False Ceiling - Boarding',
trim(Type_of_work) == 'CORRIDOR FC BOARDING' && Source_Table == 'PLN_CORRIDOR_FACT','False Ceiling - Boarding',
trim(Type_of_work)  == 'Wet Area MEP H/L Boarding Clearance'&& Source_Table == 'PLN_WETAREA_FACT','MEP High Lvl',
trim(Type_of_work)  == 'WALL TILE BOTTOM TILE'&& Source_Table == 'PLN_WETAREA_FACT','Wall Tiles',
trim(Type_of_work)  == 'WET AREA FC FRAMING'&& Source_Table == 'PLN_WETAREA_FACT','False Ceiling - Framing',
trim(Type_of_work)  == 'FC BOARDING & JOINT TAPING'&& Source_Table == 'PLN_WETAREA_FACT','False Ceiling - Boarding',
trim(Type_of_work)  == 'Wet Area Final Fixtures Installation'&& Source_Table == 'PLN_WETAREA_FACT','MEP Final Fix',
trim(Type_of_work)  == 'Keep Out (QT)'&& Source_Table == 'PLN_KEEPOUT_FACT','CAP^Q Unit QT Keep-out approvals',
trim(Type_of_work)  == 'Kitchen Stamp - Civil (I9)'&& Source_Table == 'PLN_KEEPOUT_FACT','CAP^Q (Stamp - I9) Kitchen Keep-',
trim(Type_of_work)  == 'Bathroom Stamp - Civil (L9)'&& Source_Table == 'PLN_KEEPOUT_FACT','CAP^Q (Stamp - L9) Bathroom Keep',

select2 derive(Actual_Achived = case((Legend == 'Actuals') && in (['BCC - Inspection & Approval','Power on','LV Inspection & Approval','Wooden Decking','ACP Works','Kids Play Area/ Outdoor Play Area','Swimming Pool','Changing Rooms / GYM','Lift - Balance passenger lifts','Lift - CTU','Pile Cap','Transformer payment','Pile'],trim (Activity_New))  , MAActual_Percentage,Actual_Achived )) ~> ActualAchivedderivedColumn
ActualAchivedderivedColumn2 derive(PLN_ACT = concat(Legend,' : ', toString( toDecimal( Actual_Achived_New*100,10,0)),'%')) ~> PLNACTderivedColumn
FinalFinalderivedColumn derive(PLN_ACT_NEW = concat(Legend,' : ', toString(toDecimal( Actual_AchivedNew * 100,10,0 )),'%' )) ~> PLNACTNewderivedColumn
